notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: N.V. conceived the project and the wCTU model, supervised experiments, collected and analyzed data, interpreted results, and wrote the manuscript; R.L., J.L.N. and B.M. collected data, interpreted results, and edited the manuscript; J.B.I., J.L.R. and J.D.L. contributed thermal profiles and sex ratio data from Nebraska and Ontario, and edited the manuscript.
